divergences.description: Agent A and Agent C still recommend Qwen2.5-VL, while the updated guidance indicates Qwen3-VL should be the primary 2026-era choice.
Agent A and Agent C do not include an OCR-specialist model (e.g., GLM-OCR), while the updated guidance recommends a hybrid VLM + OCR stack for faithful text extraction.
Agent B specifies explicit pixel budgets and multiples-of-32 resizing for Qwen3-VL, while Agent A and C do not emphasize these controls.

rationale: Agent A remains the most implementation-ready, but both A and C diverge on model generation, OCR specialist inclusion, and pixel-budget controls. These are substantive architecture differences, so convergence is moderate.
